name: off
text: 【速報】
trans: 【Breaking News】

name: off
text:
４人の『成長』を描く
新たなプロジェクトが始動────
trans:
A new project that depicts the growth of the 4 girls,
begins──

name: 雛菜
text: ね、今日の分ちゃんとやった～？
trans: Hey, have you casted yours today～?

name: 透
text: え
trans: Eh.

name: 透
text: 何？
trans: What?

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
やってないか～
trans:
Aha～
You haven't, huh～

name: 円香
text:
投票でしょ
今度出る番組の
trans:
You're talking about the voting, right?
For the tv program we're appearing in.

name: 雛菜
text:
へ～～～
円香先輩、やったの～！？
trans:
Heh～～～
You've done it, Madoka-senpai～!?

name: 円香
text: やってない
trans: I haven't.

name: off
text: ①有名トレーナーのもとで身体能力向上！
trans: ① Work out and get fit with a famous trainer!

name: off
text: ［投票はこちら］
trans: [Cast your vote here]

name: 雛菜
text: えっと～……
trans: Eeerm～...

name: 雛菜
text:
ほら、雛菜これに入れて～って
言ったでしょ～？
trans:
Hey, didn't Hinana say that I want us to vote for
this～?

name: 雛菜
text: ③のやつ～！
trans: Erm, option ③～!

name: 透
text: あー……
trans: Aah...

name: 円香
text: そういえば
trans: Now that you mention it.

name: 雛菜
text:
うそ～！
じゃあ今日まで１票も入れてないってこと～！？
trans:
No way～!
Which means no one else voted for it till today～!?

name: 透
text:
ふふ
入れたじゃん
trans:
Hehe.
One was added.

name: 透
text:
雛菜が
スマホから。私の
trans:
You added it.
From my phone. With my vote.

name: 雛菜
text:
それは、こうやってやるんだよ～って
お手本見せたんだよ～
trans:
That was like, this is how you do this and that～
It was just a demonstration～

name: 透
text: あー……
trans: Ahh...

name: 雛菜
text: ……毎日１票入れられたのに～……
trans: ...Even though we could have all voted once a day～...

name: off
text: ②マナー講師による厳格なレッスン！
trans:
② Receive a strict lesson from the etiquettes
instructor!

name: off
text: ［投票はこちら］
trans: [Cast your vote here]

name: 円香
text: ていうか、投票しても無駄じゃない？
trans: But even if we voted, isn't it pointless?

name: 雛菜
trans: Hmm～?

name: 円香
text:
私たちが全員で入れても、
１日たったの４票だけだし
trans:
Even if we all vote, we could only gather a total of 4
votes a day.

name: 円香
text: 期間中毎日入れたって、大した数にならない
trans:
The total number we get voting everyday won't be 
enough to sway the results.

name: 雛菜
text: そんなのわかんないでしょ～？
trans: We wouldn't know about that, right～?

name: 雛菜
text:
もしかしたらこれ
雛菜たちしか入れてないかもしれないし～
trans:
For all we know, what if we're the only ones who
had voted～

name: 円香
text:
……だとしたらこの番組、
最初から終わってるでしょ
trans:
...If that was the case then this show would be
shut down long ago.

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
やばいね
trans:
Hehe.
That'd be bad.

name: 透
text:
０％
視聴率
trans: 0% viewership.

name: 雛菜
text:
でも、ママは見るって言ってたから
１％はいくよ～
trans:
But, mama said she'd watch it, so it'd go to 1%
at least～

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
偉い
trans:
Hehe.
Mama's the greatest.

name: 透
text:
じゃー、２％か
うちが見たら
trans: It'd be 2%, then, if mine watches too.

name: 円香
text: どうせ、番組を盛り上げるための出来レース
trans:
In any case, it's probably just a rigged poll held to
drum up hype for the show.

name: 円香
text:
本当は決まってるんじゃない？
内容なんて、最初から
trans:
In truth, everything would have been decided,
wouldn't it? The show's contents and all that,
right from the start.

name: off
text: ③天才パティシエに弟子入りして特訓！
trans:
③Become the disciple of a genius patisieer and go
through special lessons!

name: off
text: ［投票はこちら］
trans: [Cast your vote here]

name: 小糸
text: お、お邪魔します……！
trans: H-Hello everyone...!

name: 透
text: あ、うーす
trans: Ah, heeya.

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
小糸ちゃん来た～～～
trans:
Aha～
Koito-chan's here～～～

name: 小糸
text: えへへ……
trans: Ehehe...

name: 小糸
text:
あ、アイス買ってきて
透ちゃんのお母さんに渡したよ
trans:
I-I bought some ice cream,
and passed them over to your mom, Toru.

name: 透
text:
イエー
最高
trans:
Yaay.
Awesum.

name: 円香
text: 小糸、なんで来たの
trans: What are you doing here, Koito.

name: 円香
text:
夏期講習じゃなかった？
今日も
trans:
You took summer courses, right?
There should also be one today.

name: 小糸
text:
あ……
う、うん……！
trans:
Ah...
Y-Yeah...!

name: 小糸
text: そうなんだけど……
trans: But then...

name: 雛菜
text:
でもそれ、今日で終わりだったんでしょ～？
小糸ちゃんもようやく遊べるね～
trans:
Even if she did, today's lessons should have ended,
right～? Koito-chan can finally have some fun～

name: 小糸
text:
そ、そうだよ！　夏期講習って言っても
夏休みの間の何回かだけだから、明日からは……
trans:
T-That's right! Besides, there's multiple classes for
this summer course, and then there's tomorrow...

name: 雛菜
text:
ま、撮影もあるし
もうすぐ夏休み終わっちゃうんだけどね～
trans:
Yeah, the shoot's tomorrow, too.
The summer break's ending soon, though～

name: 小糸
text: あ……う、うん
trans: Ah...Y-Yeah.

name: 雛菜
text:
──それで、小糸ちゃんは
ちゃんと投票した～？
trans:
──Speaking of which, did Koito-chan manage to
vote～?

name: off
text: ④人気塾講師によるスパルタ缶詰合宿！
trans:
④ Experience the super packed tuition camp
by a super popular cram school instructor!

name: off
text: ［投票はこちら］
trans: [Cast your vote here]

name: 小糸
text: 投票……？
trans: Vote...?

name: 円香
text:
今度出る番組のやつ
投票、今日まで
trans:
It's the voting featured in the program we'll be
appearing in, and it ends today.

name: 小糸
text:
あ……
し、してないよ……！
trans:
Ah...
I-I didn't vote...!

name: 雛菜
text:
へ～～～！？
小糸ちゃんもしてないの～！？
trans:
Hee～～～!?
Koito-chan didn't vote too～!?

name: 雛菜
text:
But Hinana thinks that ③ would be great～
Becoming the disciple of
trans: Hinana, said for us to all vote for ③ too～...

name: 小糸
text: ……だ、だって
trans: ...B-But,

name: 小糸
text:
みんなが投票してくれたやつを
やるのがいいのかなって……
trans:
I think it's for the best that we all do what everyone
voted for...

name: 小糸
text:
ファンの人とかが、
見たいやつが選ばれるんだし……
trans:
We'll be doing what our fans and everyone,
chose and wanted to watch...

name: 小糸
text: そういう、企画でしょ？
trans: It's that sort of project, isn't it?

name: 円香
text:
そうなんじゃない
表向きは
trans:
No it's not.
Just publicly it is.

name: 小糸
text:
わ、わたし……
全部は無理かもしれないけど
trans:
I-I... probably won't be able to do well in any of the
tasks, but,

name: 小糸
text:
そういうのに応えていけるように
なりたいな……って、思うし……
trans:
I want to be able to be able to answer to such
things... as well...

name: 小糸
text: ファンの人に……何が────
trans: And I want... to know──

name: 小糸
text: ……本当に求められてるのか、知りたい
trans: ...What our fans really want.

name: 小糸
text: 頑張りたいな
trans: I wanna try my best doing it.

name: off
text: ⑤由緒ある寺院で修行を積み、心身を鍛える！
trans:
⑤ Undergo training to the heart and mind at a
venerable temple!

name: off
text: ［投票はこちら］
trans: [Cast your vote here]

name: 雛菜
text:
でも雛菜は③がよかったな～
有名パティシエに弟子入り～……
trans:
But Hinana thinks that doing ③ is good～
I wanna be a disciple of a famous patisieer～...

name: 雛菜
text: 雛菜がやるのは雛菜が選べたらいいのに～
trans:
If only Hinana can do what Hinana chose for
myself～

name: 円香
text: 自分が食べたいだけでしょ
trans: You just wanna eat everything for yourself.

name: 雛菜
text:
だって、食べれたらいいでしょ～？
作れるようになったらもっといいし
trans:
But, it'll be fine as long as I can eat them all, right～?
It'll be even better if I learn how to make them.

name: 小糸
text:
な、なんか
逆な気がするけど……！
trans:
S-Somehow, that sounds like the order of things
are in reverse...!

name: 雛菜
text:
じゃあもしすっごい大変なやつになっちゃったら
どうするの～～～？
trans:
Then what should we do if we got a super difficult
one then～～～?

name: 円香
text:
どうもしない
普通にやるだけ
trans:
It can't be helped.
We'll just do it as we normally would.

name: 円香
text: それが仕事でしょ
trans: It is a job afterall.

name: 雛菜
text: そうだけど～……
trans: Even if that's true, still～...

name: 透
text: ……ふふっ
trans: ...Hehe.

name: 透
text: まー、やるか
trans: Weeell, let's do it.

name: 透
text: いいよ、なんでも
trans: I'll go along with anything.

name: off
text: アナタの投票で、ノクチルが“変わる”！
trans: Bring about "change" to noctchill with your votes!

name: off
text:
話題沸騰の幼馴染４人組アイドル
ノクチルによる初の冠WEBバラエティー番組
trans:
The first web variety program named after the viral
idol unit of 4 childhood friends, noctchill.

name: off
text: 『ノクチル成長中！（仮）』
trans: 『noctchill Evergrowing! (Temporary name)』

name: off
text: ※投票は本日まで！　今すぐ番組公式サイトへアクセス！
trans:
※Voting concludes today! Access the official
website and cast yours now!

name: プロデューサー
text: ──はい
trans: ─Yes.

name: プロデューサー
text:
ああ……！
お世話になっております……！
trans:
Aah...!
Thank you so much for everything...!

name: プロデューサー
text:
ええ、はい
決まったんですね……！
trans:
Right, yes.
So it's been decided, I see...!

name: プロデューサー
text:
日程は予定していた通りで、はい
────…………
trans:
We'll follow the schedule as planned, yes.
──......

name: プロデューサー
text:
……かしこまりました
当日は、よろしくお願いします
trans:
...Understood.
We'll be counting on your assistance then.

name: プロデューサー
text:
──よし
みんなに連絡だな
trans:
─Alrighty.
Time to message the girls.

name: プロデューサー
text:
はは……
雛菜はがっかりするかもな
trans:
Haha...
Looks like Hinana's gonna be disappointed.

name: プロデューサー
text:
透……と円香は、
どれでもいいって言ってたけど
trans:
Toru... and Madoka said that they'd be fine with
any of them.

name: プロデューサー
trans: As for Koito──......
